page.title: 04My Sunday In Fulwood.
page.content: A usual Sunday starts at about 10.00am when I get my breakfast and feed my pet guinea-pigs. I then make some toasted buns for my family. I go out to play with our 'gang' in some suitable clothes like jeans and a baggy comfy jumper. We play games like Kit Kan, hide and seek or man-hunt. Then we come back and go swimming at our local leisure centre. We come back to a previously prepared dinner of something like a casserole. After lunch we go out to play again in the field behind our house. Later we may go to the countryside for a drive or a walk. At tea-time we have some sandwiches and fruit or cake and then go out to play again. When I come in I have a bath and supper and go to bed.
